editor.label: Application Server - IIS6 StopAppPool
editor.description: This procedure stops an IIS application pool.

formElement.label: Host name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the host name of the IIS server (if the procedure is run on the host itself use "localhost", the default value).

formElement.label: Application pool name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the application pool to stop.
